duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide consultative customer service and support, addressing billing, policy changes, and other inquiries with a focus on a positive customer experience.
Identify gaps in coverage, upsell, cross-sell, and retain customers by providing tailored insurance solutions.
Proactively share knowledge and information to reduce customer effort and enhance their understanding of insurance products.
Adapt to each customer, offering a consultative, non-scripted approach to efficiently solve problems and address customer needs.
Manage time effectively in a fast-paced contact center environment, working non-traditional shifts and maintaining reliability in attendance.
Utilize technology and learning resources to deliver efficient problem resolution and maintain expert knowledge of insurance products and services.
Analyze, clarify, and resolve intermediate policy and account-related questions from internal and external customers.
Participate in in-house or outside insurance/industry-related courses/seminars to expand product/system knowledge and support the organization's overall strategy.
Meet individual performance metrics and goals, and suggest innovative process changes to support business practices.
Accept feedback and work well with others, incorporating best practices from team members to achieve optimal performance.
Demonstrate advanced conflict resolution skills and consistently meet or exceed performance measurement goals.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent (Four-year college degree preferred)
